GIGA BULLISH üöÄüìà
I'm bullish on $DOT  1,9e break !

$DOT has broken above its recent consolidation range with a strong impulsive move, sweeping liquidity above the 2.18 area and showing clear strength from buyers. The breakout was backed by a noticeable volume expansion, confirming real demand entering the market rather than a false move.

After the impulse, price is now consolidating just below the recent high around 2.22‚Äì2.23. This shallow pullback indicates strength, as sellers are unable to push price back into the prior range. As long as price holds above the 2.10‚Äì2.12 zone, the structure favors continuation rather than a deeper retracement.

Sellers attempted to fade the move near the highs but failed to reclaim the previous range, signaling exhaustion on the downside. Acceptance above 2.10 keeps the bullish scalp structure intact. A clean breakdown below this level would invalidate the setup, but until then, continuation toward higher liquidity zones remains the higher-probability scenario.
